author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a companion of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45764.
In response to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45370#issuecomment-2301200925, this PR is meant to update the unit tests in `CondTools/SiPixel` to use the Tracker geometry T33 as the previously used geometry T21 is not available anymore. 

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests_createDBObjects` runs fine.
N.B.: this PR requires an update of the external `cms-data` repository: https://github.com/cms-data/CalibTracker-SiPixelESProducers/pull/4

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: update `createTestDBObjects` unit test to use Tracker geometry T33
